{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3134806,"name":"","username":"FloryaBisons","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/floryabisons/{size}/183348_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-27T11:37:32.293Z","cooked":"

Hello Chief Delphi community,

I am a member of team 6232, Florya Bisons, and we are currently working on image processing for our robot. We have been successful in detecting yellow contours for cones, but we are having difficulty filtering the contours to only include those that are cone-shaped.

We would greatly appreciate any advice or suggestions on how to effectively filter the contours to ensure that only cone-shaped objects are detected. Any help would be much appreciated.

Thank you,
Alp Mete
